definitions.text: state of elementary or undifferentiated consciousness
examples: the crash intruded on his awareness

definitions.text: the faculty through which the external world is apprehended
examples: in the dark he had to depend on touch and on his senses of smell and hearing

definitions.text: the readiness to perceive sensations; elementary or undifferentiated consciousness; - Richard Eberhart
examples: gave sentience to slugs and newts
